  • Method Details

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(SalableProduct product)
      Adds the specified product to the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be added to the shopping cart

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct(SalableProduct product)
      Removes the specified product from the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be removed from the shopping cart

    • getTotal

      public double getTotal()
      Returns the total cost of all products in the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      the total cost of all products in the shopping cart

    • checkout

      public void checkout(StoreFront store)
      The checkout method is used to purchase all the products in the shopping cart from a given store. It loops through each product in the cart and calls its purchase() method with a quantity of 1. After purchasing all the products, it clears the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      store - the store from which to purchase the products

    • cancelOrder

      public void cancelOrder(StoreFront store)
      The cancelOrder method is used to cancel the purchase of all the products in the shopping cart from a given store. It loops through each product in the cart and calls its cancelPurchase() method with a quantity of 1. After canceling the purchase of all the products, it clears the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      store - the store from which to cancel the purchase of the products
